name: GFlop (LukasHaak)
description:
GFlop is a 2D sidescrolling runner, with a simple gravity switching mechanic. It features 4 levels, as well as an infinite mode. 

(Unfortunatly, the infinite mode was left with one bug, that would prevent progression, should it be triggered)

Disclaimer: This is an old student project, as such there won't be any updates.

Due to this being one of our first student projects, we didn't know how to handle resolution / UI properly, so make sure to select a high enough resultion, such as 1280 x 1024.

TeamLukas HaakGame Designer and ProgrammerDamien StergioGame Designer and ArtistHassain HusseinGame Designer
